code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const styles={inline:{background:'#fffbeb',border:'1px solid #f59e0b',color:'#92400e',borderRadius:8,padding:'8px 12px',fontSize:'0.85rem',margin:'8px 0'},footer:{background:'#f9fafb',border:'1px solid #e5e7eb',color:'#374151',borderRadius:8,padding:'8px 12px',fontSize:'0.85rem',margin:'16px 0 0'}};const AffiliateDisclosure=_ref=>{let{providerName,position='inline'}=_ref;const text=providerName?"We may earn a commission from qualifying purchases with ".concat(providerName,"."):'We may earn a commission from qualifying purchases with our affiliate partners.';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{role:"note","aria-live":"polite",style:styles[position],children:text});};export function withAffiliateAriaLabel(name){return{'aria-label':name?"Affiliate link to ".concat(name):'Affiliate link',rel:'noopener noreferrer sponsored'};}export default AffiliateDisclosure;
